commit.message:
Fix Logging in ApplyMojo during OpenShift detection

Somehow Openshift detected statement was showing without
any color

nodes.bodyText:
getLog() is retrieving the log defined in AbstractMojo which is not an instance of KitLogger.
This change is OK for now, but once we tackle #147 and #146 these variables should be private and getter methods (getKitLogger(), etc.) should be used instead
